participant_1.background:
My dad and brother are my two main sources of support.
i always put my left sock on first.
I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
my favorite music is rock and roll.
i write children s books.

participant_2.background:
I sing nursery rhymes for my son on weekends because he loves them.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
My friends would be so impressed by my cupcake recipe.
i have a long drive to work.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going great! I'm singing nursery rhymes for my son at the moment.
Haha, that's great! I don't have kids so I haven't had the pleasure of singing nursery rhymes for them.
It's so much fun! He really loves them.
What are some of your favorite nursery rhymes?
I love singing Old MacDonald Had a Farm and Twinkle Twinkle Little Star.
Those are both classics! I love those ones too.
I have a really long drive to work, so I sing nursery rhymes to pass the time.
That's a great idea! I'm sure it helps the time pass by more quickly.
It does! And it's really fun to sing along to the music.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love listening to rock and roll. It's so upbeat and energetic!
Me too! I love singing along to rock and roll songs.
It's so much fun to let loose and sing your heart out.
It is! I love it when I'm in the car and I can just sing as loud as I want without anyone hearing me.
Me too! It's the best feeling ever.
I'm glad we're both such big fans of rock and roll!
Me too! It's the best music ever.
